variables.docs: This resource is a dummy granting access to its children.
This resource returns information about the Biography answers that are in the game.

apiDataVariables.name: ids
apiDataVariables.docs: A full list of answer ids.

apiElementVariables.name: description
apiElementVariables.docs: The description of the answer; as displayed in-game when presented as an answer choice to a question during the Biography portion of character creation. Defaults to ''.

apiElementVariables.name: journal
apiElementVariables.docs: The Story Journal entry for the answer; as displayed in-game. Defaults to ''.

apiElementVariables.name: question
apiElementVariables.docs: The id of the Biography question that this answers; resolves against v2/backstory/questions. Defaults to 0.

apiElementVariables.name: professions
apiElementVariables.docs: When present, an array of professions that this answer is available as a choice for. Defaults to [].

apiElementVariables.name: races
apiElementVariables.docs: When present, an array of races that this answer is available as a choice for. Defaults to [].

variables.docs: This resource returns information about the Biography questions that are in the game.

apiDataVariables.name: ids
apiDataVariables.docs: A full list of question ids.

apiElementVariables.name: description
apiElementVariables.docs: The description of the question; as displayed in-game when presented as an question choice to a question during the Biography portion of character creation. Defaults to ''.

apiElementVariables.name: answers
apiElementVariables.docs: The list of answers for this question; resolvable against v2/backstory/answers.

apiElementVariables.name: order
apiElementVariables.docs: The order in which this question is displayed in-game while answering your characters' Biography questions during character creation.

apiElementVariables.name: professions
apiElementVariables.docs: When present, an array of professions that this question is available as a choice for. Defaults to [].

apiElementVariables.name: races
apiElementVariables.docs: When present, an array of races that this question is available as a choice for. Defaults to [].
